channel.title: How to promote your Validator node for free on RadixTalk
channel.description:
If you are a member of the **Registered Validator** group then you can promote your Validator node with a free text advert on RadixTalk.
# How does it work?
1. Join the **Registered Validator** group
https://radixtalk.com/t/joining-the-registered-validators-group/43?u=stuart
2. Write a new topic in #staking:validator-introductions to introduce your Validator Node.
3. Send a message to @Stuart with the proposed content of your advert. The ad will be linked to your Validator Introduction post in #staking:validator-introductions
4. Your text advert will be added to the list of **house adverts** that will be cycled through in order starting with a random one.
